official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to require that new employees of the United States Postal Service have complied with Selective Service registration requirements.

summary.text: Requires employees of the U.S. Postal Service (hired after the end of the 90-day period beginning on the date of enactment of this Act) to comply with Selective Service registration requirements.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to require that new employees of the United States Postal Service have complied with Selective Service registration requirements.
